content:
Play during your turn.

Select yourself or an ally within reach. The target regains [[/r 1d8+8 #healing]] Hit Points. If you are 7th level or higher, the target regains [[/r 2d8+16 #healing]] Hit Points. If you are 12th level or higher, the target regains [[/r 3d8+24 #healing]] Hit Points.
name: Healing Prayer
